name: Cobb Frittata
description: Medium Eggs, Chicken Breast, Red Onion, Red Bell Pepper, White Mushrooms, Bacon, Cherry Tomatoes, Blue Cheese, Seasoning Salt
serving: $4.26/serving   average based on best prices found per unit in nearby stores
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
In a cast iron skillet, crisp bacon. Crumble and reserve.
Working with the hot skillet, but the heat off, wilt spinach in bacon grease. Reserve.
In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and salt and pepper to taste.
Pour egg mixture into the same greased cast iron skillet and whisk in milk.
text: This riff on the classic Cobb salad in frittata form is a quick-and-easy, protein-packed, and low-carb weeknight wonder you'll want to add to your weekly repertoire.
